analysis.summary: Signature collection plan for NDA between YOOBROO, INC. (Disclosing Party) and TONY LIU (Receiving Party). Document requires single party signature from recipient only, with address field completion. No countersignature from disclosing party required based on standard unilateral NDA structure.
insights: This appears to be a unilateral NDA where only the receiving party (TONY LIU) needs to sign
YOOBROO, INC. as the disclosing party typically does not sign unilateral NDAs
Effective date is pre-set to 2025-06-30, not dependent on signature date
Address requirement suggests need for legal verification of recipient identity and location
recommendations: Signature Order: Single-stage signing - only TONY LIU needs to sign
Required Fields for TONY LIU: (1) Full legal signature, (2) Complete mailing address including street, city, state, ZIP, (3) Print name field for clarity, (4) Date of signing
No signature required from YOOBROO, INC. unless document explicitly shows signature blocks for both parties
Recommend digital signature platform (DocuSign/HelloSign) with field validation to ensure all required information is captured
Set reminder for TONY LIU to sign before effective date of 2025-06-30
Include witness signature field if jurisdictionally required for NDAs
